settings.heading: Free Retesting
settings.description:
All of our monthly programs offer free retesting every 4 months while on the probiotics. While optional, these retests can give you great insight to how your microbiome is changing thanks to the probiotics and/or lifestyle and diet changes. 
If you send in the free retest, we will update your formula for your next shipment. If the probiotics are starting to not feel like they are working as well as when you first started, we always recommend using the retest to see what new gut issues may be causing your gut to feel different.
We ship you a stool sample collection kit as soon as you subscribe.

You collect and return your stool sample to our lab. We only require that you are not on antibiotics, or have consumed alcohol before taking the sample. The sooner you send us back your sample, the sooner we perform the Floré Gut Health Test and the sooner we start formulating your custom formula!

Your sample goes through extraction, library prep, and DNA sequencing. Our scientists analyze your gut and microfora and formulation scientists lab-craft your personalized probiotics. Each formula is carefully crafted from our inventory of over 80+ clinically validated probiotic and prebiotic strains to support your specific health needs.

Your personlized probiotics reach your door in a cold pack and ready for you to start your gut health journey, one pill a day! Every month thereafter, you receive your batch of the next 30 pills so that you never run out.

settings.detailsText: 81% of Customers Reported Improvement in Immunity

80% of Customers Reported Better Food Tolerance

settings.headline: Real Results from Floré Tots Users

settings.heading: See What Everyone is Saying
settings.poweredby: POWERED BY

settings.subheadline_data_accordion: The microbiome is the collection of all the microbes and their corresponding set of genes. Sun Genomics focuses on the microbiome located in the gut. A common misconception is that all these microbes are bad for you, but that is not true; microbes play an integral role in aiding the body's immunological, nutritional, and metabolic functions.

settings.subheadline_accordion: How often will I be charged and when do I get my shipments?
settings.subheadline_data_accordion: Floré is a monthly plan. First month starts off with the Gut Health Test kit and every subsequent month you receive your custom probiotics. You can manage your monthly auto renew through Account Management. You will receive the information via email.

settings.subheadline_accordion: When can I expect to see results?
settings.subheadline_data_accordion: It's important to note that every person is different in both their gut profile as well as their reaction to probiotics. Therefore everyone's results and reaction time is a variable that we cannot predict. What we can predict is that your overall health will improve. If you don't feel moderate to significant improvement in your digestive symptoms within the first month of your custom formulation, please email customer service at customerservice@sungenomics.com so that they can look into a possible reformulation. We want to make sure your custom probiotics are working for you.

Your microbiome is always subject to change: if you take antibiotics, have a severe illness, or even change your diet, your gut microbiome may change. We provide you monthly probiotics and you can opt to re-test every 4 months of probiotics.
